# Landing Page v1 KC

Landing Page v1 of Techmarket is built using **King Composer**.It has 5 rows. The **King Composer** Backend editor of the page look like this

![](http://transvelo.github.io/docs/techmarket/images/kc-landing-page-v1.png)

## The Code

Please switch your editor to classic mode and paste the code given here :

```
[kc_row use_container="yes" _id="526585" cols_gap="{`kc-css`:{}}" force="__empty__" row_class="landing-v1-slider"][kc_column width="12/12" _id="372401"][rev_slider _id="247000" alias="landing-v1-slider"][/rev_slider][/kc_column][/kc_row][kc_row use_container="yes" _id="676485"][kc_column width="12/12" _id="351484"][techmarket_recent_posts_with_categories _id="370385" section_title="Welcome in Gaming World." description="" post_choice="recent" limit="6" show_read_more="true"][/techmarket_recent_posts_with_categories][/kc_column][/kc_row][kc_row use_container="yes" _id="207511"][kc_column width="12/12" _id="991788" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`inherit inherit 4.286em inherit`}}}}"][techmarket_products_with_image orderby="date" order="desc" _id="88079" title="Desktops PCs" shortcode_tag="featured_products" per_page="5" columns="5" template="content-product-with-rating" action_text="Shop All Desktops PCs" action_link="#" image="2988" description=""][/techmarket_products_with_image][/kc_column][/kc_row][kc_row use_container="yes" _id="577594"][kc_column width="12/12" _id="348546" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`padding|`:`inherit inherit 4.286em inherit`}}}}"][techmarket_products_with_image orderby="date" order="desc" _id="264448" title="Gaming Laptops" shortcode_tag="featured_products" per_page="10" columns="5" template="content-product-with-rating" action_text="Shop All Gaming Laptops" action_link="#" image="2989" description=""][/techmarket_products_with_image][/kc_column][/kc_row][kc_row use_container="yes" _id="117128"][kc_column width="12/12" _id="585693" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{}}"][techmarket_products_with_image orderby="date" order="desc" _id="258666" title="Accesories" shortcode_tag="featured_products" per_page="7" action_text="Shop All Accesories" action_link="#" image="2990" description="" columns="7"][/techmarket_products_with_image][/kc_column][/kc_row]
```
